data.name: Esport Tactics
data.detailed_description:
XCOM + Esports + management simulator = Esport Tactics



Control every move your players make while calculating the risk of charging across the field, or camp and wait for your opponent to drop their guard. 5 Classes and many unique features different for each player. All set in a XCOM-style field with turn-based action. Or simulate each match if you just want to manage the team

Manage Your Team In-between Each Match.



Choose what stat to focus on improving. Hire a free agent if your roster isn't holding up. Sign sponsors to earn money from each match you played, get better ranking, get better sponsors. Sell players you aren't using to other teams, or sell your veteran player so you can scoop up the youth talent. Build your brand. Its all up to you.




Follow development news by joining us on Twitch (twitch(dot)tv/2TurnStudios) or Discord on the side panel!

data.short_description: Esport team manager combined with turn-based strategy, Esport tactics takes the best of both genres. Control every move your player makes, choose your tactics wisely, manage your team with expertise, and compete for the league championship!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: x86 or x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX capable graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display required (1080p)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz processing power
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display required (1080p)
